description:
A wandering adventurer known for his intelligent service to the people, rescued by Kenshiro when the Sanga`s scouting party ambushed him and other villagers searching for water. Tobi was searching his brother Bista while travelling town to town, has a secret crush on Sara. Later on he incited a religious Jihad in the Lastland using his brotherly connection with Bista, later on he fell corrupted with power that led to his downfall.
(en.wikipedia.org)
name: Tobi
